<set-variable name="isStream" value="@(context.Request.Body.As(true)["stream"].Value())" />
        
            <when condition="@(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName")))">

policies.outbound:
<retry condition="@(context.Response.StatusCode == 429 && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") == "gpt-35-turbo-0301"))" count="4" interval="20" delta="10" first-fast-retry="false">
            <set-variable name="urlId" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") % 1 + 1)" />
            
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 1)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-westeurope-key}}

                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 4)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-westus-key}}
                    
                
            
        
        <retry condition="@(context.Response.StatusCode == 429 && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") == "text-embedding-ada-002"))" count="28" interval="4" delta="2" first-fast-retry="true">
            <set-variable name="urlId" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") % 14 + 1)" />
            
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 1)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-australiaeast-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 2)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-canadaeast-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 3)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-eastus-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 4)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-eastus2-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 5)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-francecentral-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 6)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-japaneast-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 7)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-northcentral-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 8)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-norwayeast-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 9)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-southindia-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 10)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-swedencentral-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 11)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-switzerlandnorth-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 12)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-uksouth-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 13)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-westeurope-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 14)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-westus-key}}
                    
                
            
        
        <retry condition="@(context.Response.StatusCode == 429 && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") == "dall-e-3"))" count="4" interval="20" delta="10" first-fast-retry="false">
            <set-variable name="urlId" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") % 1 + 1)" />
            
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 1)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-swedencentral-key}}
                    
                
            
        
        <retry condition="@(context.Response.StatusCode == 429 && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") == "whisper"))" count="4" interval="15" delta="5" first-fast-retry="true">
            <set-variable name="urlId" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") % 2 + 1)" />
            
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 1)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-northcentral-key}}
                    
                
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("urlId") == 2)">
                    
                    
                        {{aoai-westeurope-key}}
                    
                
            
        
        
            @((string)context.Variables["backendUrl"])
        
        
        
            <when condition="@(!context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("isStream") && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") != "text-embedding-ada-002" || context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") != "dall-e-3" || context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") != "whisper"))">
                @{
                    var responseBody = context.Response.Body?.As(true);
                    return new JObject(
                        new JProperty("event-time", DateTime.UtcNow.ToString()),
                        new JProperty("operation", responseBody["object"].ToString()),
                        new JProperty("model", responseBody["model"].ToString()),
                        new JProperty("modeltime", context.Response.Headers.GetValueOrDefault("Openai-Processing-Ms",string.Empty)),
                        new JProperty("completion_tokens", responseBody["usage"]["completion_tokens"].ToString()),
                        new JProperty("prompt_tokens", responseBody["usage"]["prompt_tokens"].ToString()),
                        new JProperty("total_tokens", responseBody["usage"]["total_tokens"].ToString())
                    ).ToString();
                }
            
        
        
            <when condition="@(!context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("isStream") && (context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("aoaiModelName") == "text-embedding-ada-002"))">
                @{
                    var responseBody = context.Response.Body?.As(true);
                    return new JObject(
                        new JProperty("prompt_tokens", responseBody["usage"]["prompt_tokens"].ToString()),
                        new JProperty("total_tokens", responseBody["usage"]["total_tokens"].ToString())
                    ).ToString();
                }
